testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links)
Verify application shows booking system, not just 'Vite + React' text
Look for service listings, booking buttons, and navigation menu
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a functional beauty salon booking system with services, navigation, and booking capabilities
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or has no interactive booking features

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Test
testCases.description: Verify landing page displays appropriate content
steps: Check for hero section with call-to-action
Look for 'Book Now' or similar buttons
Check for navigation menu with Login, Register, Gallery links
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays professional beauty salon content with clear booking options

testCases.name: Services Display Test
testCases.description: Verify services are loaded and displayed correctly
steps: Verify at least 10 services are displayed
Check each service shows: name, description, price, duration
Confirm services like 'Classic Haircut', 'Balayage Highlights', 'Keratin Treatment' are shown
testCases.expectedOutcome: All 12 services from database are displayed with complete information

testCases.name: Main Navigation Test
testCases.description: Test navigation menu functionality
steps: Verify top navigation bar is visible
Check for links: Home, Book Now, Gallery, Login, Register
Click each navigation link and verify correct page loads
Test mobile hamburger menu (if on mobile viewport)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly and load appropriate pages

testCases.name: User Registration Test
testCases.description: Test user registration flow
steps: Fill in registration form: name, email, phone, password
Check if redirected to verification page or dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully registers and receives confirmation

testCases.name: User Login Test
testCases.description: Test user login functionality with seeded user
steps: Verify successful login and redirect to dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and is redirected to /dashboard

testCases.name: Invalid Login Test
testCases.description: Test login with invalid credentials
testCases.expectedOutcome: Error message 'Invalid email or password' is displayed

testCases.name: Admin Login Test
testCases.description: Test admin login functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin successfully logs in and accesses admin panel

testCases.name: Booking Flow - Service Selection
testCases.description: Test first step of booking flow - service selection
steps: Verify list of services is displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can select a service and proceed to date selection

testCases.name: Booking Flow - Date Selection
testCases.description: Test second step of booking flow - date selection
steps: Select a future date (e.g., tomorrow or next week)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can select a date and proceed to time selection

testCases.name: Booking Flow - Time Selection
testCases.description: Test third step of booking flow - time slot selection
steps: Verify available time slots are displayed
Select an available time slot (e.g., 10:00 AM)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can select a time slot and proceed to details entry

testCases.name: Booking Flow - Customer Details
testCases.description: Test fourth step of booking flow - entering customer details
steps: Fill in customer name: John Doe
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can enter customer details and proceed to review

testCases.name: Booking Flow - Review and Confirm
testCases.description: Test fifth step of booking flow - review and confirmation
steps: Verify all booking details are displayed correctly
Check service, date, time, customer info
Wait for booking to be created
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is successfully created and confirmation page is shown

testCases.name: Booking Confirmation Display
testCases.description: Test booking confirmation page displays ticket number
steps: Verify confirmation page displays ticket number (TKT-YYYY-XXX format)
Check that booking details are shown
Verify 'View Booking' or 'Print' buttons are available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Confirmation page displays ticket number and booking details

testCases.name: Search Booking by Ticket Number
testCases.description: Test booking search functionality using ticket number
steps: Check customer name, date, time, service are shown
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is found and details are displayed correctly

testCases.name: Search Booking by Phone and Date
testCases.description: Test booking search using phone number and date
testCases.expectedOutcome: All bookings matching phone and date are shown

testCases.name: View Booking Details
testCases.description: Test viewing booking details page
steps: Check for: ticket number, status, customer info, service, date, time
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking details are displayed with action buttons

testCases.name: Cancel Booking Test
testCases.description: Test cancellation of a booking
steps: Navigate to booking details page of a confirmed booking
Check that booking status changes to 'cancelled'
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is successfully cancelled and status is updated

testCases.name: User Dashboard Access
testCases.description: Test authenticated user can access dashboard
steps: Check for: user name, booking history, quick actions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authenticated user can view their dashboard

testCases.name: User Booking History
testCases.description: Test user can view their booking history
testCases.expectedOutcome: User's booking history is displayed with correct statuses

testCases.name: User Profile View
testCases.description: Test user can view their profile
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profile displays correct information

testCases.name: User Profile Edit
testCases.description: Test user can edit their profile
steps: Verify success message and updated information
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profile is successfully updated

testCases.name: Gallery Page Test
testCases.description: Test gallery page displays work samples
steps: Test image lightbox/modal if clicking on images
testCases.expectedOutcome: Gallery page displays images of past work

testCases.name: Admin Dashboard Access
testCases.description: Test admin can access admin dashboard
steps: Check for: statistics, quick actions, navigation menu
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin dashboard displays with all sections

testCases.name: Admin Dashboard Statistics
testCases.description: Test admin dashboard displays statistics
steps: Check for: total bookings, completed, cancelled, revenue
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard shows accurate statistics from database

testCases.name: Admin Bookings List View
testCases.description: Test admin can view all bookings in list format
steps: Check for columns: ticket, customer, date, time, status
Test filtering by status (confirmed, completed, cancelled)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All bookings are displayed with filtering options

testCases.name: Admin Bookings Calendar View
testCases.description: Test admin calendar view of bookings
steps: Check that bookings appear on correct dates
testCases.expectedOutcome: Calendar displays bookings on appropriate dates

testCases.name: Admin View Booking Details
testCases.description: Test admin can view booking details
steps: Verify all booking details are displayed
Verify admin action buttons (cancel, complete, add notes)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin sees detailed booking information with admin actions

testCases.name: Admin Create Booking
testCases.description: Test admin can create booking on behalf of customer
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin successfully creates a booking

testCases.name: Admin Capacity Settings
testCases.description: Test admin capacity management interface
steps: Check default capacity for different days
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can view and modify capacity settings

testCases.name: Admin Capacity Override
testCases.description: Test admin can set capacity overrides for specific dates
steps: Create a capacity override for a future date
Set custom capacity or block time slots
Verify override is displayed in list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Capacity override is successfully created

testCases.name: Admin Customer List
testCases.description: Test admin can view customer list
steps: Check for: name, email, phone, total bookings
testCases.expectedOutcome: All customers are displayed with basic information

testCases.name: Admin View Customer Details
testCases.description: Test admin can view individual customer details
steps: Check booking history for this customer
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer details and history are displayed

testCases.name: Admin Reports Access
testCases.description: Test admin can access reports page
steps: Check for: revenue reports, booking trends, customer stats
testCases.expectedOutcome: Reports page displays various business metrics

testCases.name: Admin Gallery Management
testCases.description: Test admin gallery management interface
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can manage gallery images

testCases.name: Admin Settings Page
testCases.description: Test admin settings page
steps: Check for: business info, operating hours, notification settings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Settings page displays configuration options

testCases.name: Protected Route Redirect Test
testCases.description: Test unauthenticated users are redirected from protected routes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes

testCases.name: User Logout Test
testCases.description: Test user can logout successfully
steps: Verify redirect to home page or login page
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs out and session is cleared

testCases.name: Mobile Responsive Design
testCases.description: Test application works on mobile viewport
steps: Navigate through booking flow on mobile
Verify all elements are properly sized and clickable
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully functional on mobile devices

testCases.name: Form Validation Test
testCases.description: Test form validation works correctly
steps: Try to submit with empty fields
Enter mismatched passwords (if confirm password exists)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All form fields are properly validated

testCases.name: API Error Handling
testCases.description: Test application handles API errors gracefully
steps: Search for non-existent ticket number: TKT-9999-999
Verify friendly error message is displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays user-friendly error messages

testCases.name: Toast Notification System
testCases.description: Test toast notifications appear for user actions
steps: Perform various actions (login, create booking, etc.)
Check that success messages are green/positive
Check that error messages are red/negative
Verify toasts auto-dismiss after a few seconds
testCases.expectedOutcome: Toast notifications provide feedback for all user actions

testCases.name: Loading States Test
testCases.description: Test loading indicators appear during async operations
steps: Perform actions that trigger API calls
Verify loading spinner or skeleton appears
Check that buttons are disabled during loading
Verify loading state clears after completion
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loading indicators provide feedback during async operations

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features
steps: Navigate through site using keyboard only (Tab key)
Verify all interactive elements are reachable
Test form labels are associated with inputs
testCases.expectedOutcome: Basic accessibility standards are met

testCases.name: Date Selection Validation
testCases.description: Test date selection prevents invalid dates
steps: Verify dates beyond booking window are disabled
Test that only valid future dates can be selected
testCases.expectedOutcome: Only valid future dates can be selected for bookings

testCases.name: Time Slot Availability Test
testCases.description: Test time slot availability is accurate
steps: Select a date with existing bookings
Check which time slots are shown as available
Verify fully booked slots are disabled
testCases.expectedOutcome: Time slot availability accurately reflects current bookings
